General.Name: Corner Growth Acquisition Corp 2
General.Description: Corner Growth Acquisition Corp. 2 does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more operating businesses or assets in the technology sector. Corner Growth Acquisition Corp. 2 was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.
General.Address: 251 Lytton Avenue, Palo Alto, CA, United States, 94301
